properties.query:
DeviceImageLoadEvents
| where InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\coregen.exe" and (not((FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32\\" or FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\" or FolderPath startswith "C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft Silverlight\\" or FolderPath startswith "C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft Silverlight\\")))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detect usage of DLL "coregen.exe" (Microsoft CoreCLR Native Image Generator) binary to sideload arbitrary DLLs.
